page.title: 10TOURISM.
page.content: It was decided to do a survey of visitors to Eyam. Two children asked five questions of visiting people. They did this on different days of the week and times of the day They found that the day of the week didn't have any influence but the weather did.It appeared that more people came in the middle of the day than early morning or late afternoon.The village is very popular with school parties but it was decided not to interview any of these. The survey asked five questions These were--- . 1{Why are you visiting Eyam? { }2{Where have you come from? { }3{What type of transport have {you used? { }4{Is this your first visit? { }5{Would you like to live in Eyam?
